post.author: Henry
post.content:
제가 임시직으로 일하고 있는 회사 Internal Job Posting입니다.
회사정보는 www.socan.ca를 참조하세요.

Good luck.~

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

JOB POSTING

INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY

POSITION TITLE:                Programmer  
REPORTS TO:                Project Manager – E-Commerce
LOCATION:                        Toronto
PAYBAND LEVEL:                6
SALARY RANGE:                Minimum: $41,310        Mid-Point:  $48,600


RESPONSIBILITIES:

The primary responsibility will be both the development and maintenance of eCommerce initiatives written using JAVA and Oracle and the deployment of content for the SOCAN Website. Under direction, the applicant will document, develop, code, test, debug and implement new software or enhancements to existing software.  The applicant must be competent to work on complex programs with guidance. The applicant will assist in the planning, analysis and documentation of requirements; organizing the technical systems specifications; and the scheduling of tasks for a given project.  


SKILLS AND KNOWLEDGE REQUIRED:

·        Position requires post-secondary education in computer science/programming or an equivalent of related education and experience.  
·        A demonstrated detailed proficiency and development experience is required in several of the following:  
o        Oracle RDBMS,
o        JAVA,
o        JAVA script,
o        Object Oriented Programming,
o        PL/SQL,
o        Dreamweaver,
o        Photoshop,
o        XML,
o        HTML
·        Experience in Unix is preferred,
·        A demonstrated facility with problem/change management process,
·        Well developed analytical, problem solving, programming and organizational skills,
·        Strong customer service orientation,
·        Excellent verbal and written communication skills,
·        Proficiency with the Microsoft Office suite of tools is expected,
·        Internet experience is required,
·        Lotus Notes experience is desirable,
·        Ability to work under pressure to tight deadlines,
·        Team player with good interpersonal skills




APPLICATIONS:

If you are interested in and qualify for this position, please apply in writing to Human Resources and include a recent copy of your resume.

SELECTION:

Skills may be tested and selection will be based on factors such as past performance, previous related experience and alignment of personal skills and attributes to those required to perform the job.  Only qualified applicants will be contacted for an interview.

DEADLINE:

The deadline for applications is Friday, June 4th, 2004.

PLEASE NOTE:

In this position if you opt for a 4-day week your day off (either Monday or Friday) will be determined by your Manager in accordance with Information Technology business requirements.  If you already work a 4-day workweek, you may be required to change your day off.
post.title: Internal Job Posting #1(Programmer)
